title: Problem with install game in windows 7 x64
body: Hi to all.I am working in a network station and i have this problem.I try to install the game to new pc with windows 7 X64 and i receive a message that i cant install the game to windows xp sp3...I have windows 7 X64 greek edition...Any solution?I have so many customers who waiting to play in new pc and they cant!!

replies.body:
Can you ensure the PC you're trying to install to has been updated to the latest version of Windows 7 through windows update? Also, be sure you're grabbing the installer from [**this page**](https://signup.leagueoflegends.com/en/signup/redownload) and are running the installer as admin (right-click, *run as administrator*).

Let me know if this caused any noticeable change.
